gen:link.msg:message: `NetResult` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_NetResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_NetResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_ChildrenOfNetResultCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_ChildrenOfNetResultCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_ChildrenOfNetResultDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountSegmentReportingSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T4_ChildrenOfNetResultDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
